review: It works great. With access to all the content I want.
author: Greg

review: Very easy to get started and good selection to watch, also has good music
author: G. L. Kenr "drive"

review: The Fire TV Stick is great I like the interactive menu.Now I wish I could cast what I may be watching on my phone to the fire stick instead of having to load it to the fire stick
author: Kevin Cobb Sr

review: Beware: If you are using this for sporting events (like Watch ESPN) save yourself some aggravation and buy Apple TV instead.  For some reason there are far more events on Watch ESPN (Apples app) than Watch ESPN on Fire TV stick.  Same with  Fire TV.  Very disappointed.  Was told by Amazon support that the issue is with ESPN since they apparently control the content for each.
author: Bruce L "BLL"

review: I am very pleased with my amazon fire stick. Met my expectations. Do not have any problems connecting to my wi fi.
author: Rudy Valdez

review: Works very well and lots of media choices.  Excellent companion to my Roku - now i feel like I have everything I need for streaming.  Amazing price too.
author: laurent442
